channel.title: Oldderi - Dupes/[]Char fix, Spheres, BioHazard Run, Enhancer, RIFT teleportation
channel.description:
[center][size=76pt]Oldderi[/size][/center] [center]Go ahead, Leech. Anyone can release on R-server. It'd be nice if you guys posted once in a while, i get lonely. ): I fixed rollbacks aswell, my way. This is from my [url=http://] development thread[/url], [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,485264.0.html#Spheres]Spheres[/url] Many things are unfinished, so take effort and do it yourself <3 Fixed many duplication bugs, more probably are still there though.. [hr] [hr] Credits; Me Rash, - RuneFX Sanity, I vain I - Server Help More people who I don't know, [hr] [hr] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?1dq188s4wl4doq5] Download Here![/url] [url=http://up.ht/h9u3Rk]Mirror[/url] Client + Server are together. [hr] [hr] Ahh note; I was playing with the teleportion of spheres, to just make it tele you to somewhere, and change [b]Ahrims[/b] stairs ClickingButton ID code to another one for the NPC of Spheres, -> and uncomment out his stairs so they work again. (=[/center]
Byte[] was 120,000,000 bytes% its now 400,000 Char[] is 2,000,000 and Int[] is 1,000,000 havn't fixed them Then i formated EVERYTHING with an IDE, [size=14pt]• Content[/size] ○ Juggernaut option in replace of world map ○ Once enough kills, and toggled your juggernaut strength will damage those closest ○ A enhancer costing GP for a boost ○ Go to the enhancer for a boost, costs GP has basically the same effects as Potions ○ New prayers, not very fond we'll see ○ Barrel Chest Guardian ○ Warriors guild Animator working ○ A new RIFT teleportation button which teleports to ... ○ Supply Vender! (Also includes Enhancer) ○ Safari! ○ Void Dungeon ○ Currently Working on Quest; Scroll down Pictures for the Safari, Void Dungeon, and Supply Vender (Trade Spheres) will be up shortly. Here is some Content i don't care for or don't feel worth naming; [code]Boss' Godwars Dungeon Staff of Light Tormented demons Barrows Decent Combat, Will work on it Moving Objects/NPC's/Dont know why i took a picture of the stalls, they looked stylish i guess.. Fully functional Clan Chat Corporal Beast Skill Guides, (No Combat Guides) PK Patrol ForceChatting PK Rules Purple sweets added/Rocktail Trying to find Dupes, not very good, fixed maybe one, working on it.. Skill cape Glitches fixed MultiBarrage on players added The majority of weapons have the correct interfaces [/code] [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image11-1.png[/img][img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image3-2.png[/img] [hr] [center][img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/62264a94f394445f354b15e9c0a34811598efbf4da39a3ee5e6b4b0d3255bfef95601890afd80709da39a3ee5e6b4b0d3255bfef95601890afd807098837232f368641c3a216.gif[/img][/center] [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image2-5.png[/img] BioHazard is a maximum game of four players. After the lobby you are put into the building in Sophanem. The point of the game is to last as long as possible, with waves of monsters coming out of the Grave. Different monsters spawn from the graves, they walk down the line, and you must kill them to earn Points, Simple. • To do: ○ Lobby ○ Objects ○ Npc Spawning ○ Point System for BioHazard ○ keeping the Monsters in the boundaries ○ more waves ○ More to Add [hr] [size=14pt]• Quest; Wealthy Build[/size] Story line; .. Will be up shortly, sorry [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image4-1.png[/img] [hr] [size=14pt]• Spheres[/size] Spheres are obtainable objects in Recoil Rift, for which if you collect several of the right combination (Look down for list of obtainable spheres) you may trade them in for several more then decent weapons. You can count how many Spheres you have by going to your quest tab, although it is hard to tell spheres apart from each other. Still working on an custom interface for Spheres. The Servers starting to introduce Spheres for the player to hunt them; (Story line of Spheres) Spheres are a magical and mysterious forces, there power is trapped within the glass balls. Your job as an adventurer is to seek out these mysterious orbs. If you collect all of the different Monsters or Demons trapped inside the orbs, you will gain a force beyond anything recognizable to the Recoil Rift. If you're expecting a Enchanted Sword, or a Mystical Spell, think again. Just be ready to expect the unexpected. Just remember these Demons and Monsters where trapped within the orbs from someone who has tricked them, the one who put them there will not be pleased with you letting them out. How much Orbs are there you ask? • Earth • Water • Air • Fire • Electricity • Lust There could be more lurking around . . . [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image1.png[/img] [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/Image7-1.png[/img] [hr] [size=14pt]• Contamination Zone[/size] I've made a Contamination Zone Lumbridge, i felt like it would be cool to have a barren land, nestled by deformed cruel mysterious befouling creatures. I've also made it mandatory to visit the Contamination Zone although i have not made it take any hitpoints away if you go out with a mask yet. I'll be working on this a little more, adding NPC's making it take away hitpoints and making a little quest to go along with it. Also of course a monster of imagining which will drop a pestilence sphere, don't know what a sphere is? Please read my earlier statement on them. [img]http://i664.photobucket.com/albums/vv9/armadylZeus/CONTAMINIATIOTNTIONTITNTO.png[/img] The equipped mask picture of the the screen has a darker screen to perhaps show or give it more of a desolate feeling. • To do: ○ Take away HP ○ Adding NPC Content ○ Collectables to form a misc. object ○ More to come! [hr]

item.title: Oldderi - Dupes/[]Char fix, Spheres, BioHazard Run, Enhancer, RIFT teleportation
item.dc:creator: @Zivearia Zivearia
item.description:
@Zivearia wrote:

[quote=“darkangel996, post:30, topic:389344”][quote author=Zivearia link=topic=485264.msg3556857#msg3556857 date=1301962638]

how do i enter the contaminated thing?

EDIT: also update links not working i need to re-download client

You go up Juliets And Romeo’s stairs in the Tomb don’t just enter Lumbridge. and i will fix them.

And FYI, i didnt put any objects to prevent people from just walking into lumbridge so its kinda bleh.

EDIT: Fixed Links.

I was about to ask this aswell.

Do the spheres work?

Also, the how do you enter the contamination zone? what stairs?

Yes the spheres work great,

You get them,
crack them,
a black void opens up and teles you
i forgot to make it tele you to anywhere so make it w’e
and ahrims stairs spawns a npc, so change the clickingbutton ID, and uncomment out ahrims stairs
it’ll take a sec.

Annd, the stairs that are used for romeo and Juliets quest, go up them and contamination should come into effect, im not sure if there the ones in varrock darkangel, they will put you in lumby, and i just made a teleport to juliets tomb, but i just used Xcoords and Ycoords i forgot to actually make the tele.
[/quote]

oh kk whats coords? if you don’t mind/remember them :)[/quote]

Humm, its where juliet is on the tomb, there on R-server somewhere, ill see if i can get them.

EDIT: Cant find it, but it should be in your source folder.

Read full topic
item.source: Oldderi - Dupes/[]Char fix, Spheres, BioHazard Run, Enhancer, RIFT teleportation

And FYI, i didnt put any objects to prevent people from just walking into lumbridge so its kinda bleh.

EDIT: Fixed Links.

I was about to ask this aswell.

Do the spheres work?

Also, the how do you enter the contamination zone? what stairs?
[/quote]

Yes the spheres work great,

You get them,
crack them,
a black void opens up and teles you
i forgot to make it tele you to anywhere so make it w’e
and ahrims stairs spawns a npc, so change the clickingbutton ID, and uncomment out ahrims stairs
it’ll take a sec.

Annd, the stairs that are used for romeo and Juliets quest, go up them and contamination should come into effect, im not sure if there the ones in varrock darkangel, they will put you in lumby, and i just made a teleport to juliets tomb, but i just used Xcoords and Ycoords i forgot to actually make the tele.[/quote]

oh kk whats coords? if you don’t mind/remember them
